include/physicalmodels/fpdoublewell.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002   Fokker-Planck Model for Double Well
00003 
00004 Reference: 
00005 + Miller, R.N., Carter E.F., Blue S.T., "Data assimilation into
00006   nonlinear stochastic models", Tellus (1999), 51 A, 167-194
00007 
00008   dP     d[f(x)P]     1   d^2 P
00009   --  =  --------  +  - q -----
00010   dt        dx        2   dx^2
00011 
00012   f(x) = 4x(x^2-1) (drift)
00013   q = constant (input)
00014 
00015 
00016 */
00017 
00018 #define _FP_DOUBLE_WELL_  "fp-double-well"
00019 
00020 /* define ndims and nvars for this model */
00021 #undef _MODEL_NDIMS_
00022 #undef _MODEL_NVARS_
00023 #define _MODEL_NDIMS_ 1
00024 #define _MODEL_NVARS_ 1
00025 
00026 typedef struct fp_double_well_parameters {
00027   double q;            /* diffusion coefficient */
00028   double pdf_integral; /* not an input          */
00029 } FPDoubleWell;
00030 
00031 #define drift(x) (4.0*(x)*(1.0-(x)*(x))) 
00032 
00033 int FPDoubleWellInitialize    (void*,void*);
00034 int FPDoubleWellCleanup       (void*);
